committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to study the eligibility of the St. Mary's River in the States of Florida and Georgia for potential addition to the wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain segment of the St. Mary's River in Florida and Georgia for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to study the eligibility of the St. Mary's River in the States of Florida and Georgia for potential addition to the wild and scenic rivers system.
